main event: A motorist spotted a metallic, disk-shaped object near Ulysses, Kansas on September 11, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 40-50 feet in diameter with a dome on top.
The object had a dull color similar to brushed aluminum or stainless steel.
The object followed the road for a short distance, then made a sharp right turn and disappeared from view in less than 5 seconds.
The object was estimated to be traveling at tremendous speed, much faster than any conventional aircraft at the time.
The witness reported that the object seemed to be trying to avoid her car at one point.
